data.author: Ian Harrison

changelog.release_notes: Fixed minor time display bug at X:00.

Choose your events!

Use the Settings page to enable/disable the events you are interested in.
When the SetPebble page appears, choose "Pebble Account Token" if you want the settings to apply to all your watches, or enter your serial number to change a single watch.

New name, new features!
Now counts down to the next big US-based MINI gathering in 2015.  List currently includes:
- MINIS on the Dragon April 29th (MOTD)
- A MINI Vacation in Vegas May 28th (AMVIV)   
- MINIS on Top June 19 (MOT)
- MINIS on the Mack July 31 (MACK)
- MINIS in the Mountains August 5 (MITM)
- MINIS in Foliage October 1 (MiF)
- MINIS in the Ozarks October 22 (MITO)
If you know of a large national or regional MINI event let me know and I'll add it to the list!
Tidied up messages while the event is running.

Added Battery indicator, Bluetooth connected indicator.  Changed typeface on time display, added AM/PM indication and a smaller seconds display.  Centered the hours:minutes portion of the time display better.

data.description:
New name, new features!
Now counts down to the next big US-based MINI gathering in 2015. List currently includes:
 - MINIs on the Dragon April 29th (MOTD)
 - A MINI Vacation in Vegas May 28th (AMVIV)
 - MINIs on Top June 19 (MOT)
 - MINIs on the Mack July 31 (MACK)
 - MINIs in the Mountains August 5 (MITM)
 - MINIs in Foliage October 1 (MiF)
 - MINIs in the Ozarks October 22 (MITO)
Use the Settings page to enable/disable the events you are interested in.
When the SetPebble page appears, choose "Pebble Account Token" if you want the settings to apply to all your watches, or enter your serial number to change a single watch.
If you know of a large national or regional MINI event let me know through the support email and I'll add it to the list!

latest_release.release_notes:
Choose your events!

Use the Settings page to enable/disable the events you are interested in.
When the SetPebble page appears, choose "Pebble Account Token" if you want the settings to apply to all your watches, or enter your serial number to change a single watch.

data.title: MINI Countdown
